Wave after wave slowly Sailing.DialogueText:
Ok so first lets learn SAILING. Put your captain in the boat by clicking the boat then the captain. Next go to the map and drag the boat with the captain to the safari island!
QUEST:Do the sailing things that Muhmuguh says!
Wave after wave slowly Sailing.Name: Wave after wave slowly Sailing

Rising up and Growing as a Gamer.DialogueText:
So what exactly is GAMING. Simply put pick sprouts to get bits and use those bits to upgrade your garden! Over time things will get more... gamey..
QUEST:Go to the Underground Computer and upgrade the Gaming Garden 3 times!
Rising up and Growing as a Gamer.Name: Rising up and Growing as a Gamer

Learn the Language of the Universe.DialogueText:
So DIVINITY... ok basically you need to meditate on the altar to get Divinity Points which you spend and unlock new divinities! You can only be linked to 1 divinity at once but can change weekly!
QUEST:Learn Divinity from Muhmuguh!
Learn the Language of the Universe.Name: Learn the Language of the Universe

Bring me the Booty.DialogueText:
I be out here lookin' for treasure but I haven't found any. I'm not even sure where to look I didn't read the Sailing tutorial.
QUEST:Get Porkchop some gold bars. He wont take them don't worry he has no space in his boat.
Bring me the Booty.Name: Bring me the Booty

Sailing for some Sparks.DialogueText:
I must say I almost enjoyed looking at the bars more than having them for meself... hows about you go find me some more treasure?
QUEST:Find Porkchop some lightning treasure.
Sailing for some Sparks.Name: Sailing for some Sparks

Seeking Treasure Shrooms.DialogueText:
Hows about ye find me some more exotic treasures then? Set sail matey!
QUEST:Find Porkchop some rare multishroom treasure.
Seeking Treasure Shrooms.Name: Seeking Treasure Shrooms

Ye finest treasure at once!.DialogueText:
I bet me lucky black cap there's something greater to be found... find me the rarest treasure there is I must see it with me own eye!
QUEST:Find Porkchop the rarest treasure there is!
Ye finest treasure at once!.Name: Ye finest treasure at once!

Shut up the Namecallers!.DialogueText:
I HATE them all so much. Oh I wish I wish I wish everyone would just be nice to me... blurblblurg...
QUEST:Beat up monsters to change public perception of Slargon.
Shut up the Namecallers!.Name: Shut up the Namecallers!

Smack the meanies!.DialogueText:
You know having fwends is awesome! I just wish I had more cuz those maccies down the road are super meanie heads too...
QUEST:Beat up Maccies to further change public perception of Slargon.
Smack the meanies!.Name: Smack the meanies!

Mess with the Misters!.DialogueText:
You're like... so super cool!!! Hey do you think you can do the same thing for those tubey looking thingies across town??
QUEST:Beat up Mister Brightsides to uh well to make Slargon feel good I guess.
Mess with the Misters!.Name: Mess with the Misters!

Assert Dominance over the Meek!.DialogueText:
Adventuwa I need you to do this again. Pwease!!! Its those cheese nubby creatures. They're so icky and gross looking completely gross!!!
QUEST:Complete the cycle. Destroy the meek.
Assert Dominance over the Meek!.Name: Assert Dominance over the Meek!

Think twice speak once.DialogueText:
Speak not with words but with belief. I shall listen to whatever it is I can hear...
QUEST:I speak pretentious and he's saying you need to level up divinity and show your faith.
Think twice speak once.Name: Think twice speak once

Speak from the heart not the mind.DialogueText:
Mmm... perhaps a greater voice from you will suit us both better...
QUEST:Wow la de da ya friggin piglet. Level up divinity more but I'd totally understand if you just wanna stop talking to this guy.
Speak from the heart not the mind.Name: Speak from the heart not the mind

Learn the Language of the Universe.DialogueText:
Only when you connect with your true beliefs will we finally be able to communicate without error...
QUEST:He's just being a pansy because his divinity is all he has... maybe if you outlevel him he'll stop being so annoying.
Learn the Language of the Universe.Name: Learn the Language of the Universe
